abstract: Intel said that its sales for the fourth quarter would fall short of previously reduced forecasts by about $500 million.
snippet: Intel said that its sales for the fourth quarter would fall short of previously reduced forecasts by about $500 million.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The global economic slump is hitting the computer industry faster and deeper than previously expected.

headline.main: As Sales Picture Worsens, Intel Trims Forecast Again
headline.print_headline: As Sales Picture Worsens, Intel Trims Forecast Again
